episode_summary: In this episode, Lou Adler discusses the importance of building strong relationships with developers and landlords to secure exclusive real estate opportunities in New York City. He shares insights on leveraging AI for market insights and emphasizes the value of putting client relationships first. Lou also provides strategies for scaling a brokerage and maintaining agent motivation in a competitive market.
